snippet: Huggable, a social robot prototype, is being tested to determine whether it can have therapeutic value for children who have long hospital stays.
abstract: Huggable the teddy bear is a social robot prototype that is being tested at Boston Children's Hospital to see if it has therapeutic value for children who have long hospital stays; device, essentially a high-tech puppet, was developed at MIT's Media Lab.
lead_paragraph: Huggable, a social robot prototype, is being tested to determine whether it can have therapeutic value for children who have long hospital stays.

headline.print_headline: A Robot Teddy Bear, Making the Rounds
headline.main: A Talking Teddy Bear Practicing in the Pediatric Hospital
